players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob was a great person and his death is a huge loss for our town. I am shocked to hear that he has been killed."
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "Diana, why are you lying? I'm the detective and I investigated you last night. You're the mafioso."
Diana: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and my investigation proves she is mafia. We must vote her out immediately."
You: "Diana is clearly lying. I investigated her last night and she is mafia. Charlie, you must vote with me to eliminate the real threat."
